src_original: (Pravr-v III 258)  pūrvaṃ me bhikṣavaḥ saṃbodhim anabhisaṃbuddhasyaikākino rahogatasya pratisaṃlīnasyaivaṃ cetasi cetaḥparivitarka udapādi /
tgt_original: 「我本為菩薩時，未成佛道中有此念：

src_original: kṛcchraṃ vatāyaṃ loka āpanno yad uta jāyate 'pi jīryate 'pi mriyate 'pi cyavate 'py upapadyate 'pi /  atha ca punar ime satvā jarāmaraṇasyottare niḥsaraṇaṃ yathābhūtaṃ na prajānanti //
tgt_original: 『此世間極為勤苦； 有生、有老、有病、有死，然此五盛陰不得盡本原。

src_original: tasya mamaitad abhavat* kasmiṃ sati jarāmaraṇaṃ bhavati kiṃpratyayaṃ ca punar jarāmaraṇam iti /
tgt_original: 』是時，我復作是念： 『由何因緣有生、老、病、死？

src_original: tasya mama yoniśo manasi kurvata evaṃ yathābhūtasyābhisamayo babhūva /  jātyāṃ satyāṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ bhavati jātipratyayaṃ ca punar jarāmaraṇam iti /
tgt_original: 復由何因緣致此災患？ 』當思惟此時，復生此念： 『有生則有老、病、死。

src_original: tasya mamaitad abhavat* kasmiṃ sati jātir bhavati kiṃpratyayā ca punar jātir iti /
tgt_original: 』爾時，當思惟是時，復更生念： 『由何因緣有生？

src_original: tasya mama yoniśo manasi kurvata evaṃ yathābhūtasyābhisamayo babhūva /  bhave sati jātir bhavati bhavapratyayā ca punar jātir iti /  tasya mamaitad abhavat kasmiṃ sati bhavo bhavati kiṃpratyayaś ca punar bhava iti /
tgt_original: 』此由有而生。

src_original: tasya mama yoniśo manasi kurvata evaṃ yathābhūtasyābhisamayo babhūva /  vijñāne sati nāmarūpaṃ bhavati vijñānapratyayaṃ ca punar nāmarūpam iti /
tgt_original: 時我復作是念： 『名色何由而有？ 』觀察是時，復由識而有名色。

src_original: tasya mamaitad abhavat* kasmiṃ sati vijñānaṃ bhavati kiṃpratyayaṃ ca punar vijñānam iti /
tgt_original: 『此識何由而有？ 』觀察是時，由行生識。

src_original: tasya mama vijñānāt pratyudāvartate mānasaṃ nātaḥ pareṇa vyativartate /  (Pravr-v III 259)
tgt_original: 時我復作是念：

src_original: yad uta vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ nāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ ṣaḍāyatanapratyayas  sparśaḥ sparśapratyayā vedanā vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā tṛṣṇāpratyayam upādānam upādānapratyayo  bhavaḥ bhavapratyayā jātir jātipratyayā jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsāḥ
tgt_original: 『行何由而生？ 』觀察是時，行由癡而生。 無明緣行，行緣識，識緣名色，名色緣六入，六入緣更樂，更樂緣痛，痛緣愛，愛緣受，受緣有，有緣生，生緣死，死緣愁、憂、苦、惱，不可稱計。

src_original: saṃbhavanty evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavatīti /
tgt_original: 如是名為苦盛陰所習。 「我爾時復作是念：

src_original: tasya mamaitad abhavat kasminn asati jarāmaraṇaṃ na bhavati kasya nirodhāc ca punar jarāmaraṇanirodha iti /
tgt_original: 『由何因緣滅生、老、病、死？

src_original: tasya mama yoniśo manasi kurvataḥ evaṃ yathābhūtasyābhisamayo babhūva /  jātyām asatyāṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ na bhavati jātinirodhāc ca punar jarāmaraṇanirodha iti //
tgt_original: 』我觀察是時，生滅，老、病、死滅。

src_original: tasya mamaitad abhavat* kasminn asati jātir na bhavati /
tgt_original: 時復生此念： 『由何而無生？

src_original: kasya nirodhāc ca punar jātinirodha iti /  tasya mama yoniśo manasi kurvata evaṃ yathābhūtasyābhisamayo babhūva /
tgt_original: 』觀此生原，有滅，生則滅。 復念：

src_original: tasya mama yoniśo manasi kurvata evaṃ yathābhūtasyābhisamayo babhūva /
tgt_original: 』時生此念：

src_original: upādāne (45v = GBM 6.691) asati bhavo na bhavati upādānanirodhāc ca punar bhavanirodha iti //  tasya mamaitad abhavat* kasminn asati upādānaṃ na bhavati kasya nirodhāc ca punar upādānanirodha iti /
tgt_original: 『無受則無有。

src_original: tasya mama yoniśo manasi kurvata evaṃ yathābhūtasyābhisamayo babhūva /
tgt_original: 』時我生此念：

src_original: tṛṣṇāyām asatyām upādānaṃ na bhavati tṛṣṇānirodhāc ca punar upādānanirodha iti /
tgt_original: 『由何滅受？ 』觀察是時，愛滅，受則滅。

src_original: tasya mamaitad abhavat* kasminn asati tṛṣṇā na bhavati kasya nirodhāc ca punas tṛṣṇānirodha iti tasya mama yoniśo manasi kurvata evaṃ yathābhūtasyābhisamayo babhūva /
tgt_original: 復生此念：

src_original: vedanāyām asatyāṃ tṛṣṇā na bhavati vedanānirodhāc ca punas tṛṣṇānirodha iti /
tgt_original: 『由何而滅愛？ 』重更觀察，痛滅，愛則滅。

src_original: tasya mamaitad abhavat kasminn asati vedanā na bhavati /  kasya nirodhāc ca punar vedanānirodha iti /  tasya mama yoniśo manasi kurvata evaṃ yathābhūtasyābhisamayo babhūva /
tgt_original: 復思惟：

src_original: nāmarūpanirodho nāmarūpanirodhāt ṣaḍāyatananirodhaḥ ṣaḍāyatananirodhāt sparśanirodhaḥ
tgt_original: 名色滅，則六入滅； 六入滅，則更樂滅；

src_original: sparśanirodhād vedanānirodhaḥ vedanānirodhāt tṛṣṇānirodhaḥ tṛṣṇānirodhād upādānanirodhaḥ
tgt_original: 更樂滅，則痛滅； 痛滅，則愛滅； 愛滅，則受滅； 受滅，則有滅；

src_original: upādānanirodhād bhavanirodho bhavanirodhāj jātinirodhaḥ jātinirodhāj jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsā  nirudhyaṃty evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati /
tgt_original: 有滅，則生滅； 生滅，則老、病滅，老、病滅，則死滅，是謂名為五盛陰滅。

src_original: tasya mamaitad abhavad adhigato me paurāṇo mārgaḥ paurāṇaṃ (46r = GBM 6.692)  vartma paurāṇaṃ paṭumaṃ pūrvakair ṛṣibhir yātānuyātaṃ /
tgt_original: 「時我復生此念： 『此識最為原首，令人致此生、老、病、死；

src_original: tadyathā puruṣo 'raṇye pravaṇe 'nvāhiṇḍamānaḥ adhigacchet paurāṇaṃ mārgaṃ paurāṇaṃ
tgt_original: 然不能知此生、老、病、死生之原本。 』猶如有人在山林中行，逐小徑道。

src_original: vartma paurāṇaṃ paṭumaṃ pūrvakair manuṣyair yātānuyātaṃ sa tam adhigacchet* sa tam  adhigacchaṃ paśyet paurāṇaṃ nagaraṃ paurāṇīṃ rājadhānīm ārāmasaṃpannāṃ vanasaṃpannāṃ  puṣkariṇīsaṃpannāṃ śubhāṃ dāvavatīṃ ramaṇīyāṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punar asyaivaṃ syād yanv
tgt_original: 小復前行，見舊大道，古昔諸人在中行處。 是時，彼人便復此道，小復前進，見舊城郭、園觀、浴池，皆悉茂盛，但彼城中無有居民。

src_original: ahaṃ rājñe gatvā ārocayeyam iti /  sa rājñe gatvā ārocayati /
tgt_original: 此人見已，還歸本國，前白王言：

src_original: yat khalu deva jānīyā ihāham adrākṣam araṇye pravaṇe 'nvāhiṇḍamāṇaḥ paurāṇaṃ mārgaṃ paurāṇaṃ vartma paurāṇaṃ paṭumaṃ pūrvakair manuṣyair yātānuyātaṃ
tgt_original: 『昨遊山林見好城郭，樹木繁茂，但彼城中無有人民。

src_original: tad devo nagaraṃ māpayatu tad rājā nagaraṃ samāpayet* /
tgt_original: 可使人民在彼城止住。 』是時，國王聞此人語，即居止人民；

src_original: sā ca syād rājadhānī apareṇa samayena riddhā ca sphītā ca kṣemā ca subhikṣā cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyā ca //
tgt_original: 然此城郭還復如故，人民熾盛，快樂無比。
